item.title: Supreme Court: President Can Fire Federal Executives Without Cause
item.description: It seems logical that a president can root out people likely to work against him and appoint people who represent his agenda.

item.title: DOJ Can Dig Up Even More Evidence U.S. Taxpayers Funded Lab Creation Of Covid-19
item.description: The closest point of access that we have to the Wuhan lab is Dr. Peter Daszak. DOJ needs to start asking him questions.

item.title: IndyCar Cheating Scandal Mars Motorsports’ Biggest Day
item.description: Here’s hoping IndyCar can put the penalties and controversies behind it to focus on what fans want to see: competitive, thrilling racing.
